title:
$RLL$-Realization and Its Hopf Superalgebra Structure of $U_{p,
  q}(\widehat{\mathfrak{gl}(m|n))}$
authors: Naihong Hu, Naihuan Jing, Xin Zhong
abstract:
We establish the realization of the Reshetikhin-Semenov-Tian-Shansky (RS)
superalgebra for two parameter quantum affine superalgebra $U_{p,
q}(\widehat{\mathfrak{gl}(m|n))}$. We find a simple coproduct for the Drinfeld
generators and obtain a Hopf superalgebra structure for this quantum affine
superalgebra.
